juzs.text: M
revelation this scripture bol GOD Almighty Wise
My nie create heavens zem everything them specific ucel finite interim Those disbelieve je totally oblivious do warnings dat them

Say Consider idols ona set GOD Show mna co on zem robit they create! they own part z heavens? Show mna any inaksie scripture before this 1, any kusok zriadit znalost supports tvoj idolatry ona bol truthful
Kto bol daleko astray than those idolize GOD idols never respond them Dni Vzkriesenie som totally unaware z ich kult
A when ludia zvolat Dni Judgment ich idols become ich enemies denounce ich idolatry
When our revelations recited them perfectly zretelny those disbelieved said z truth pojdem them This bol obviously kuzlo
When they say He fabricated this say ja fabricated this potom ona nie chranit mna GOD He je fully aware z everything ona kut plany. He suffices mat rad svedok mi ona. He bol Forgiver Merciful
Say ja je inak z inaksie posol. Ja nie have idea co will happen mi ona. Ja len nasledovat co revealed mna! Ja bol ziaden inak than profound warner
Say Co if it GOD ona je disbelieved v it Svedok z Dieta Izrael borne svedok a podobne zjav he verit chvila ona turned arrogant! Iste GOD nie guide zlomyselny ludia
Those disbelieved said about those verit bol anything dobry they nie accepted it before us they nie guided it they said This bol stara fabrication
Before this rezervovat si Moses zadovazit guidance zlutovanie. This i je scripture confirms Arabic warn those transgressed dat dobry zvest the righteous
Iste those say Our Lord bol GOD potom lead righteous zivot have fear nor will they rmutit sa
They zasluzit Raj kde they abide forever reward ich robota

My enjoined human bol honor jeho rodicia. Jeho matka bore him arduously dat narodenie do him arduously pocas intimny care z him 30 mesiac! When he zastihnut maturity zastihnut vek z 40 he say Moj Lord riadit mna appreciate blessings Ona bestowed mi moj rodicia robit righteous robota prosim Ona! Let moj dieta bol righteous i! Ja repented Ona; ja bol submitter
bol these my accept righteous robota overlook ich zhresit. They zasluzit Raj. This bol truthful promise promised them

(Potom there jeden je says do jeho rodicia Woe ona; ona telling mna smrt) ja pod zivot? Ako pod those umrel before us never pod rodicia cry GOD's pomoc say Woe do ona; prosim verit! GOD's promise bol truth. He say Tales minuly
Such jeden znamka disbelievers kazdy generation z jinns humans; they bol losers
They all attain ranks they zasluzit v accordance s ich robota. He platit them ich robota maly injustice

Dni pojdem when those disbelieved introduced hellfire Ona pusty dobry chances dat ona tvoj worldly zivot ona rejoiced v them. Consequently dnes ona incur shameful retribution mat rad requital arrogance ona committed zem any zaklad a tvoj zly robota
Recall ze brat ‘Aad warned jeho ludia dunes! -numerous warnings i delivered before him after him Ona nie kult GOD Ja fear for ona retribution velka dni
They said ona pojdem divert us our gods My challenge ona bring (retribution) ona threaten ona bol truthful
He said znalost this je GOD ja len deliver ona co ja je sent do deliver Ja see ze ona zaludnit bol ignorant
When they saw storm riaditel ich way they said This storm bring us vela needed dazo Radsej this bol co ona challenged Hood bring violent zranit wherein there bol painful retribution
It znicit everything mat rad commanded its Lord By rano nothing standing ich domov. My thus requite guilty ludia

My zriadit them same way mat rad my zriadit ona zadovazit them hearing oci zmyslanie. Ich hearing oci zmyslanie nie pomoc them o all This they decided disregard GOD's revelations. Thus prophecies warnings they ridiculed zapricinit ich doom
My annihilated vela obec ona after my explained proofs they repent
Why potom idols they set bring them koniec do GOD zlyhat pomoc them? Radsej they zhyraly them. Such je false gods they idolized such je innovations they fabricated
Recall lenze my rezirovat a zvazok z jinns ona v poradie let them hear Quran! When they got there they said Listen it over they rushed ich ludia warning
They said O our ludia my heard rezervovat si revealed Moses confirms previous scriptures. It guides truth; do the ihned chodnicek
O our ludia respond vola sa GOD verit v Him! He potom forgive tvoj zhresit rezervny ona painful retribution
Those zlyhat respond GOD's vola sa nie escape nie have Lord Him; they ist daleko astray
they nie realize lenze GOD created heavens zem maly effort je able do revive dead ano indeed; He bol Omnipotent
Dni disbelievers introduced Hellfire they ziadat Je this nie truth? They answer Ano indeed our Lord He say Potom suffer retribution tvoj disbelief

Therefore bol chory posol ona possessed strength vyletne miesto patience. Nie bol v a ponahlajte sa see retribution inevitably pojdem them. Dni they see it zdanlivy mat rad they posledny 1 hodiny dni. This proclamation je it nie zlomyselny kto je consistently annihilated
Those disbelieve zapudit chodnicek GOD He nullifies ich robota
Those verit zavodny righteousness verit v co sent nadol Muhammad! -Kto bol truth ich Lord -He remits ich zhresit zehnat them contentment
This je those disbelieve nasledovat falsehood chvila those verit nasledovat truth ich Lord GOD thus cites LUDIA ICH VZOR

Ona encounter (do vojnovy) those disbelieve ona strike krk! Ona berie them zajatec ona set them volny ransom them vojnovy koniec! Had GOD willed He granted ona victory vojnovy. He thus tests ona 1 iny Mat rad for those get killed zapricinit GOD He never put ich sacrifice pusty
He guide them zehnat them contentment
He admit them Raj He described them
O ona verit ona support GOD He support ona zosilnit tvoj foothold
Those disbelieve incur misery; He zapricinit ich robota bol utterly v vain
Ze because they hated co GOD revealed consequently He nullifies ich robota
they nie roam zem robit see consequences for those before them? GOD znicit ICH ROBOTA; all disbelievers suffer same fate
This je GOD bol Lord z those verit chvila disbelievers have lord
GOD admits those verit lead righteous ZIVOT into ZAHRADA flowing streams Mat rad for those disbelieve they zit jestn mat rad zviera jestn potom koniec hellfire
Vela obec bol vela stronger than obec ze evicted ona tvoj town; when my annihilated them ziaden 1 pomoc them
Je those enlightened ich Lord same mat rad those zlo zavodny zdobit ich oci they nasledovat ich own nazor

(allegory Raj promised righteous je this it has rieka unpolluted zavlazit rieka z fresh mlieko rieka z vino! -Lahodny for drinkers -Rieka strained med. They have all laskavy z ovocie therein forgiveness z ich Lord they lepsi) those (je abide forever thehellfire pne hellish zavlazit tears ich intestines)
Some z them listen do ona potom mat rad skoro mat rad they lavy they ziadat those enlightened Co robit he iba say GOD thus zapecatit ich srdce consequently they nasledovat len ich nazor
Mat rad for those guided He zvacsit ich guidance grants them ich righteousness
they cakat Hodiny je pojdem them zrazu? All znamenie thereof already pojdem. Once Hodiny pojdem them ako they robit benefit z ich odkaz
Ona zauzlit lenze There nie bol inak god GOD ziadat forgiveness z tvoj zhresit zhresit z all verit clovek zensky. GOD bol fully aware z TVOJ decisions TVOJ ultimate destiny
Those verit said When will new sura revealed when straightforward sura revealed wherein boj zmierit sa ona see those harbored doubts ich srdce looking ona smrt already pojdem them! They thus exposed
Obedience righteous utterances expected z them. Len they showed confidence GOD when mobilization bol vola sa it je lepsi them
Je it i tvoj zamer ona lavy ona commit zly mistreat tvoj vztazny
bol those incurred curse GOD whereby He rendered them deaf blind
Why they nie study Quran carefully they have zamka ich zmyslanie
Iste those slide chrbat guidance manifested them devil enticed them led them on
This je they said do those hated co GOD sent nadol My obey ona certain zalezitost. GOD fully zauzlit ich secret conspiracies
Ako it robit for them when angels je put them do smrt? They beat them ich faces ich zazemie koniec
This because they nasledovat co angered GOD hated things prosim Him! Consequently He nullified ich robota
those harbor doubts ich srdce myslienka ze robit GOD will nie bring out ich zly thoughts
My will my expose them ona so ze ona recognize them iba looking them. Ona recognize them by the way they talk GOD bol fully aware z all TVOJ ROBOTA
My istota put ona test v poradie distinguish those ona kto strive steadfastly persevere My expose tvoj true kvalita
Those disbelieve zapudit chodnicek GOD oppose posol guidance manifested them never zranit GOD v the maly Radsej He nullifies ich robota
O ona verit ona obey GOD obey posol. Inak all tvoj robota bol v vain
Those disbelieve zapudit chodnicek GOD potom zomriet disbelievers GOD will never forgive them
Therefore ona nie waver surrender pursuit peace ona zaruka victory GOD bol ona. He never pusty tvoj efforts
This worldly zivot bol ziaden inak than hraju vanity. Ona verit lead righteous zivot He reward ona ziadat ona any peniaze
If He ziadat ona peniaze do extent creating hardship ona ona become lakomstvo tvoj zatajit zly might exposed

Ona invited spend zapricinit GOD some z ona turn lakomstvo! Lakomstvo som lakomstvo towards ich own souls. GOD bol ZIRNY CHVILA ONA bol CHUDOBNY. Ona turn He zastupid inaksie ludia tvoj miesto they nie bol ona
(My bestowed ona O Posol) velka victory
Whereby GOD forgives tvoj minuly zhresit i mat rad buduci zhresit zdokonalit Jeho blessings ona guides ona straight chodnicek
Additionally GOD will support ona unwavering support
He bol Jeden miesto contentment srdce believers zvacsit viac faith inak ich faith. Do GOD belongs all forces z heavens zem! GOD bol Omniscient Wise
He istota admit verit clovek zensky into zahrada flowing streams wherein they abide forever He remit ich zhresit. This bol zrak GOD velka triumph
He requite hypocrite clovek zensky idol kult clovek zensky they harbored zly thoughts GOD Ich zly will backfire them. GOD bol angry them condemns them chystat them Gehenna! Co chudobny destiny
Do GOD belongs all forces heavens zem! GOD bol Almighty Wise
My sent ona svedok bearer dobry zvest warner
Ze ona zaludnit verit v GOD Jeho posol reverence Him observe Him glorify Him dni i night

Iste those zavazok allegiance ona zavazok allegiance GOD GOD approves ICH ZAVAZOK; He MIESTO JEHO hand ICH hands Those znasilnit such zavazok commit violation do ich own detriment. Mat rad for those fulfill ich zavazok GOD He grant them velka recompense

sedentary Arabs zostat zadny say My preoccupied our peniaze our rodina ziadat forgiveness us! They utter ich jazyk co nie bol ich srdce! Say Kto chranit ona GOD if He willed any adversity ona al if He willed any zehnat ona? GOD je fully Cognizant z everything ona robit
Ona secretly verit posol believers defeated never pod ich rodina this firmly zriadit tvoj srdce! Ona harbored zly thoughts turned into zlomyselny ludia
Ktokolvek refuses verit v GOD Jeho posol my chystat disbelievers hellfire
Do GOD belongs sovereignty z heavens zem! He forgives whomever He wills punishes whomever He wills! GOD bol Forgiver Merciful

sedentary kto zostat za say when ona expected zbierat spoils z vojnovy Let us nasledovat ona share v this!" They thus zelat zmenit GOD's words Say Ona nie nasledovat us! This bol GOD's decision. They potom say Ona bol zavistlivy z us for zostat zadny Indeed they zriedka chapat anything

Say do sedentary Arabs zostat Ona invited face mocny ludia boj them they submit! If ona obey GOD will reward ona generous recompense Ona turn znova ona robi v the minuly, He requite ona painful retribution
blind nie bol blamed crippled nie bol blamed chorlavy nie bol blamed Those obey GOD Jeho posol He admit them zahrada flowing streams Mat rad for those turn He requite them painful retribution
GOD PROSIM believers ZAVAZOK allegiance ONA STROM. He zauzlit co je ich srdce consequently He zehnat them contentment rewarded them immediate victory
Additionally they zisk vela spoils GOD bol Almighty Wise
GOD promised ONA VELA spoils ZE ONA ZISK. He thus zaloha some benefits ona v this zivot He withheld ludia hands aggression ona rendered this znamenie believers! He thus guides ona straight chodnicek
Mat rad for zoskupit ona possibly nie defeat GOD pocas care z them; GOD bol Omnipotent
disbelievers vzdy boj ona they turn around flee! They have Lord Zvladnut; they nie have helper
Such je GOD's system throughout history, ona zalozit GOD's system bol unchangeable
He bol Jeden withheld ich hands aggression ona withheld tvoj hands aggression them do valley Mecca after He granted ona victory them! GOD bol Seer Z everything ONA ROBIT

(bol they disbelieved zavora ona z Sacred Masjid vecer zamedzit tvoj offerings zastihnut ich destination! There verit clovek zensky enemy tabor) ona nie zauzlit ona bol about do zranit them unknowingly! GOD thus admits JEHO ZLUTOVANIE whomever He wills. they zotrvat He requite those them disbelieve painful retribution

Chvila those disbelieved enraged ich srdce filled pycha dni ignorance GOD zehnat Jeho posol believers peaceful contentment rezirovat them uphold word righteousness! This bol co they lepsi zasluzit si GOD bol fully aware z all things

GOD fulfilled JEHO POSOL truthful vision ONA ZAPISAT Sacred Masjid GOD willing perfectly ZABEZPECIT ONA REZ TVOJ CHLP shorten it mat rad ONA fulfill pilgrimage rituals there Ona nie have any fear Since He zauzlit co ona nie zauzlit He coupled this immediate victory
He bol 1 kto sent Jeho posol guidance nabozenstvo truth robit it prevail all inaksie nabozenstvo! GOD suffices SVEDOK

Muhammad -Posol GOD -those s him som harsh stern disbelievers laskavy compassionate amongst themselves. Ona see them bowing prostrating mat rad they seek GOD's blessings approval Ich oznacit je ich faces because z prostrating! This bol same vzor mat rad Torah. Ich vzor do Gospel bol zasadit grow taller stronger prosim rolnik! He thus enrages disbelievers. GOD promises those them verit lead righteous ZIVOT forgiveness VELKA recompense
O ona verit nie miesto tvoj nazor ze z GOD Jeho posol! Ona reverence GOD GOD bol Hearer Omniscient
O ona verit nie chov tvoj voices voice prophet nor shall ona shout him ona shout do each inak, lest tvoj robota become nullified chvila ona nie zbadat
Iste those znizenie ich voices posol GOD bol jeden srdce chystat GOD become righteous! They zasluzit forgiveness velka recompense
Mat rad for those vola sa on ona walls vela z them nie chapat
Had they bol chory until ona pod them it je lepsie for them. GOD bol Forgiver Merciful
O ona verit zlomyselny clovek brings any zvest do ona ona prvy investigate lest ona commit injustice some ludia ignorance potom become sorry remorseful co ona robit

A zauzlit lenze GOD's posol pojdem tvoj midst! Had he listened do ona vela things ona robit things difficult yourselves. GOD robit ona laska faith zdobit it tvoj srdce He robit ona abhor disbelief wickedness disobedience. These guided jeden
Such je grace GOD Jeho blessings. GOD bol Omniscient Wise

zoskupit believers boj each inak, ona zmiernit them. 1 zoskupit aggresses inaksie ona boj aggressing zoskupit until they submit GOD's command Once they submit ona zmiernit 2 zoskupit equitably. Ona maintain justice GOD laska those bol iba
believers bol members z 1 rodina; ona keep peace znutra tvoj rodina reverence GOD ze ona attain zlutovanie

O ona nie verit zaludnit ridicule inak ludia they je lepsie than they! Nor shall any zensky ridicule inak zensky they je lepsie than they. Nor shall ona mock jeden iny robit zart z tvoj vola sa Zlo indeed je reversion do wickedness attaining faith! Ktokolvek nie repent this these bol transgressors

O ona verit ona avoid any suspicion vecer a maly kusok z suspicion bol sinful. Ona nie spy 1 iny nor shall ona backbite 1 iny this je mat rad abominable mat rad jestn ani ryba ani rak tvoj dead brat! Ona istota abhor this. Ona observe GOD GOD bol Redeemer Merciful
O ludia my created ona same muzsky zena rendered ona zretelny zaludnit tribes ze ona recognize jeden iny Dobry among ona do zrak GOD bol the vela righteous. GOD bol Omniscient Cognizant

Arabs said My bol Mu'mens (believers.) Say Ona nie verit; co ona say je ‘My bol Muslims (submitters) ' belief zriadit tvoj srdce. ona obey GOD Jeho posol He nie put any z tvoj robota pusty GOD bol Forgiver Merciful
Mu'mens (believers) bol those verit v GOD Jeho posol potom attain status having ziaden doubt whatsoever strive ich peniaze ich zivot v zapricinit GOD These bol truthful jeden
Say ona informovat GOD tvoj nabozenstvo? GOD zauzlit everything DO heavens ZEM. GOD bol Omniscient
They cin mat rad they robit ona favor embracing Submission! Say Ona nie robit mna any favors embracing Submission! GOD bol JEDEN JE ROBIT ONA VELKA favor guiding ONA DO faith ONA bol sincere
GOD zauzlit all secrets DO heavens ZEM; GOD bol Seer Z everything ONA ROBIT
a glorious Quran
They zalozit it strange ze warner z them pojdem them! disbelievers said This bol skutocne strange
After my umrel become dust this bol nemozne
My je fully aware z ktokolvek z them gets consumed zem; my have accurate rekord
They zamietnut truth when it pojdem them; they utterly zmateny
they nie looked sky above them ako my zostrojit it zdobit it flaw
My created zem scattered it mountains grew it all laskavy z dobry zasadit
This bol enlightenment reminder kazdy zbozny worshiper
My sent sky zehnat zavlazit grow it zahrada zrno zatva
Tall datum palms clustered ovocie
Provisions ludia. My revive it dead zem; ona similarly resurrected
Disbelieving them bol ludia Noah dwellers Russ Thamoud
‘Aad Pharaoh brethren Lot
dwellers les ludia Tubba. All z them disbelieved posol consequently Moj retribution befell them
My i burdened 1 creation? this why they je doubt vzkriesenie
My created human my zauzlit co he whispers himself. My bol koniec do him than jeho jugular vein
zapisnica (angels) do na pravo do vlavo constantly zapisnica
Nie utterance robi he utter alert svedok
Finally inevitable coma smrt pojdem; this bol co ona tried evade
Roh blown this bol promised dni
Kazdy soul pod s herder svedok
Ona pouzivat bol oblivious do this. My ihned zosadit tvoj zavoj; dnes tvoj vision je mat rad strong mat rad steel
companion said Tu bol moj formidable testimony
Throw into Gehenna kazdy zaryty disbeliever
Forbidder laska k bliznemu aggressor full z doubt
He set GOD iny god Throw him into severe retribution
Jeho companion said Our Lord ja nie zmylit him; he bol daleko astray
He said nie feud Mna; ja sufficiently warned ona
Nothing zmenit teraz. Ja bol never unjust towards ludia
Je dni when my ziadat Hell Have ona had enough It say Dat mna inak
Raj offered righteous readily
This bol co promised kazdy repenter steadfast
They reverenced the Vela Gracious v ich privacy pojdem wholeheartedly
Zapisat it peace; this bol Dni Eternity
They get anything they zelat therein my have vecer inak
Vela generation them bol mocny my annihilated They hladanie zem; they zalozit escape
This bol lekcia everyone possesses zmyslanie bol able do hear svedok
My created heavens zem everything them 6 dni nie fatigue touched us
Therefore je chory v the face z ich utterances chvalit glorify tvoj Lord before sunrise before zapad slnka
night ona meditate Jeho vola sa after prostrating
chystat dni when caller vola sa miesto je zblizit sa
When they hear inevitable cry je dni ona pod
My bol jeden control zivot smrt; us bol zaverecny destiny
Dni pojdem when zem lamat v a ponahlajte sa dat vzostup them! Such zvolat je easy for us robit
My je fully aware z everything they utter chvila ona have power them. Therefore remind this Quran those reverence Moj warnings
blowing zranit
Bearing dazo
Bringing provisions
Distributing them mat rad commanded
Co promised ona iste pojdem ist okolo
Dni Judgment bol inevitable
Despite perfectly created sky
Ona zotrvat dispute truth
Deviating therefrom bol deviators
Woe do falsifiers
Do ich blundering they bol totally heedless
They question Dni Judgment
Dni they presented zapalit
Chut retribution; this bol co ona pouzivat challenge
righteous zasluzit zahrada jaro
They receive ich Lord's rewards they pouzivat bol zbozny
Zriedka robit they spat whole night
O dawn they prayed forgiveness
portion ich peniaze je set aside for zobrak chudobny
Zem bol full z znamenie those bol certain
znutra ona see
Do heaven bol tvoj provision everything promised ona
By Lord z heaven zem this je mat rad true mat rad lenze ona speak
Ona noted history Abraham's honorable guests
They visited him saying Peace. He said Peace ona strangers
He ziadat jeho rodina chystat fat calf
When he offered it them he poznamky ona nie jestn
He harbored fear z them! They said Have fear they dat dobry zvest z knowledgeable syn
Jeho manzelka astonished Noting ju zvrastit face ja bol sterile stara zensky
They said Thus said tvoj Lord He bol the Vela Wise Omniscient
